parameters.name: PDataIn
parameters.description: Pointer to a raw bitmap (HBITMAP) cast as a LONGLONG

title: IModelDoc2.InsertSketchPictureDatax64
description: Inserts a picture into the current sketch in 64-bit applications.
signature:
void InsertSketchPictureDatax64( 
   System.Int32
Width
,
   System.Int32
Height
,
   System.Int64
PDataIn
)

parameters.name: PDataIn
parameters.description: Pointer to a raw bitmap (HBITMAP) cast as a LONGLONG

remarks:
This method is only available through early binding and with 64-bit versions of the SOLIDWORKS Design software.
A copy of the specified bitmap data is created. The SOLIDWORKS Design software does not release your bitmap object.
